title: Revenue earned from sports merchandise worldwide 2006 to 2015
yAxis: Merchandising revenue in billion U.S. dollars
summary: In general Merchandising revenue in billion U.S. dollars has fallen over the Year.
Merchandising revenue in billion U.S. dollars is slightly decreasing from 2008 to 2009, roughly constant from 2009 to 2012, and finally slightly increasing from 2012 to 2014.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2008 and 2009.
The highest Merchandising revenue in billion U.S. dollars, of value 21.26 was reached at Year 2008
Minimum Merchandising revenue in billion U.S. dollars about 17.57 was reached at Year 2011
